name: Knock Knock VR
description:
Discover what you did.

An experiment in VR with a bit of dabbling with behavior trees.   There's not much to it - just a brief experience centered around dialog.

SteamVR executable, uses the VR Interaction Framework.

To interact, you must look at the dialogs and press the trigger button.  If you can't look at the OK button and pull trigger, you may need to restart it(bug). :(   

Coding:  Mrbiggles1
Story: https://actawesome.itch.io/

Various assets from the Unity store, including VR Interaction Framework

Great assets from the great Quaternius!

http://quaternius.com/assets.html
